questions.instruction:
Questions 37–39
Complete the summary below.
Choose NO MORE THAN TWO WORDS from the passage for each answer.
The use of fire Neanderthalers could not have survived without fire because the conditions they lived in were 37 . Most evidence of purpose-built fires takes the form of ash piles, features of which suggest that the fires lasted a 38 time. It is hard to be certain about the size and structure of the fires, though they were certainly needed to protect the occupants from dangerous 39 , among other things.

questions.instruction:
Question 40
Choose the correct letter, A, B, C or D.
40 The purpose of the writer of this article is to Aargue that Neanderthal homes were bigger than originally thought. Bexplain why Neanderthal people migrated to Western Europe. Cdiscuss what is known about Neanderthal settlements. Dtrack the progress of early Neanderthal development.

content.questionText: The purpose of the writer of this article is to

options.label: A
options.text: Aargue that Neanderthal homes were bigger than originally thought.

options.label: B
options.text: Bexplain why Neanderthal people migrated to Western Europe.

options.label: C
options.text: Cdiscuss what is known about Neanderthal settlements.

options.label: D
options.text: Dtrack the progress of early Neanderthal development.
